Overview

The registry is a database of Kevoree models mainly used by KevScript interpreters to resolve TypeDefinitions and DeployUnits.

API

It provides a REST API to GET the content of the database, but needs a secured OAuth2 authentication for any PUT, POST operations.

Let's go

You can register right now and publish your own content to the Kevoree registry within minutes.
